fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Uraku Misugiri__
Signature and BIS

__Cinnabar Spindle__
Old event weapon, can be much better with perfect timings.

__Harbinger of Dawn__
3-star weapon which outperforms Cinnabar Spindle if your artifacts are bad.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__All 5 star statstick CRIT weapons__
Generally worth ignoring the passives.

__Wolf-Fang__
Battle Pass weapon that loses to Cinnabar Spindle even at R5

fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Fluttering Hasode
**2)** Hiyoku: Twin Blades: Elemental Burst

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__Husk of Opulent Dreams__
Generally if you have Normal Attacks this is the strongest.

__Golden Troupe__
Strongly recommended to play entirely off-field.
